text: læa xupma brrda phu thi bricakh thraphy khxng phwk khea pheux sæwngha khwam phungcı khx ngxallxh læa pheux hı keid khwam mankhng kætaw khxng phwk khea xeng nan dang xupmay swn hæng hnung n thi nein sung sung mi fn hnak prasb kæ man læw man k na ma sung phl khxng man sxng thea tæ tha midi mi fn hnak prasb kæ man k mi fn prxy«læa xallxh nan thrng hen nı sing thi phwk cea kratha kan xyu
